Package com.compendium.core.db.management

Interface Summary
DBConstants  
DBConstantsDerby  
DBConstantsMySQL  
DBProgressListener DBProgressListener is an interface you can implement to get progress events.
 

Class Summary
DBAdminDatabase This class is responsible for creating and accessing the administration database that Compendium uses for maintaining the list of user created database and global system properties.
DBAdminDerbyDatabase This class is responsible for creating and accessing the Derby administration database that Compendium uses for maintaining the list of user created database and global system properties.
DBBackupDatabase This class is responsible for backing up user databases.
DBConnection This class is a wrapper class for a Connection object, and stores additional information about its state.
DBConnectionManager The class manages a set of connections for a given database
DBConvertDerbyToMySQLDatabase  
DBConvertMySQLToDerbyDatabase  
DBCopyData  
DBCopyDatabase  
DBDatabaseManager This class, with the help of the DBConnectionManager, opens connections for databases.
DBEmptyDatabase This class creates a new Empty Database.
DBNewDatabase This class handles creating a new database, adds the default data to it and if required, a new user record.
DBRestoreDatabase This class restores the data in a given sql file into the named database.
 

Exception Summary
DBDatabaseNameException Signals that the requested database name already exists.
DBDatabaseTypeException Signals that the requested database type is unknown.
